page.title: 16ELDERLY CARE
page.content: The warden central consol system is for O.A.P. that cannot move around very well.If for instance a pensioner wanted her pension and could not go and get it because she had an illness. She would press a black button and it would bleep at central control. The warden would then stop the bleeping and talk through a mircophone to them, the lady would tell him what was wrong,and her name and address.This information would be fed into a computer which would give fuller information.For instance it will tell you where her nearest relations are. The wardens will then ring them up and they will tell them to get their mothers pension for her.It can be used in sheltered homes or individual houses.It is ideal in emergency situations.
